imdb.plot outline: Zee Companion is a one-of-a-kind LIVE show that acts as an interactive portal between viewers, hosts and experts. The show aims to connect with the viewer and become their companion. The show's affable hosts Anjali Kusre and Natasha Asghar act as these companions to the viewer throughout the day and share experiences, discuss issues and aid them in getting proper guidance and advice from a renowned panel of experts. Presented in an interesting and engaging manner, Zee Companion is a live and interactive show on weekdays every hour from 1.30 pm, culminating into a half hour show at 6.30 pm with a renowned guest / expert who is well-versed in that day's topic and able to answer the people's queries with sound facts and authority. Each day a fresh topic is taken up, ranging from relationships, health and wellbeing, business and law to social issues, careers and education. All issues that are of relevance to the South Asian viewer are taken up within this show. Viewers call, email, or post on Facebook or Twitter to ask their questions or air their views.
imdb.title: ZEE Companion
